content: summer blossom granny square designed by buttonnose crochet | facebook | instagram | ravelry | email | blog materials scheepjes catona 5ply/sport/#2 weight ** 3 5 mm hook scissors and needle to sew in ends ** any weight yarn can be used with appropriate hook for the yarn size 4 10cm square gauge gauge is not important stitches & abbreviations used - us terms chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch space space half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble this pattern has been designed and written by natasha thorley of buttonnose crochet please do not share copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell your finished items but please give buttonnose crochet credit ©buttonnose crochet 2018 p ag e | 2 special stitches fpdc - front post double_crochet yarn over yo insert hook from the front around the post of the indicated stitch through to the back yo pull through a loop yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through 2 loops bpdc - back post double_crochet yarn over yo insert hook from the back around the post of the indicated stitch through to the front yo pull through a loop yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through 2 loops popcorn - popcorn make 5 double_crochet in same st pull up a loop on last st made remove hook insert hook in first stitch made through to the loop on last st around the back of the stitches pull through loop chain 1 to secure stpc - starting popcorn chain 3 4 double_crochet in same space pull up a loop on last st made remove hook insert hook in first stitch made through to the loop on last st around the back of the stitches pull through loop chain 1 to secure ij - invisible join instead of slip_stitch to the first stitch of the round cut yarn and pull through with a needle insert needle and yarn under the v of the 2nd st of the round next insert your needle and yarn back into the last st made of the round this creates a fake v over the top of the first st of the round stdc - standing double_crochet make a slip knot on hook yarn over insert hook into st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through 2 loops sttr - standing treble_crochet make a sl knot on the hook yarn over 2 x insert hook into st/space yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops x 3 this pattern has been designed and written by natasha thorley of buttonnose crochet please do not share copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell your finished items but please give buttonnose crochet credit ©buttonnose crochet 2018 p ag e | 3 notes summer blossom can be made in any weight yarn using the hook size recommended for the yarn round 2 can be made 2 ways either with fpdc or bpdc invisible join is recommended if changing colours standing
